name: Choo Choo Circuit
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 47.

All the local trains are stuck in a loop.

Get each train to its corresponding station by manipulating the tracks and ensuring the trains don't crash into each other in this puzzle game.

Controls:

Left Click - Enable or disable switch tracks. Switch tracks can be activated while the game is paused.
Spacebar - Pause/Resume
F - Fast Forward
R - Reset
ESC - Quit
